ing.item: Frozen white grape juice concentrate (6 oz. each); thawed

directions.step:
Stir together club soda or seltzer and grape juice concentrate. Pour into two soda bottles. Cap tightly and chill. Serves 8 to 10.
Per serving: 30 cal; 0 prot; 0 fat; 7 g carb; 0 chol; 29 mg sod; 0 fiber; vegan
Source: Vegetarian Times, Jan 94/MM by DEEANNE
From Gemini's MASSIVE MealMaster collection at www.synapse.com/~gemini
